game.title: The Tome Retrieval
game.objective: Obtain the ancient tome from a castle in the mountains.
game.description: You are on a quest to find and retrieve an ancient tome from a castle located somewhere in the mountain range. Once you have it, return the tome to the quest giver.

task.objective: Navigate to the castle in the mountains.
task.description: You must locate and enter the castle where the ancient tome is believed to be hidden.
task.location: Mountains, near the Castle of Eldoria

task.objective: Find and obtain the ancient tome.
task.description: Once inside the castle, search for the ancient tome and secure it for your return journey.
task.location: Castle of Eldoria, library or secret chamber

task.objective: Return to the quest giver with the tome.
task.description: Safely make your way back and deliver the ancient tome to The Wise Sage.
task.location: The Wise Sage's Hut, near the castle
